verses.verse: I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has not <S%G683>rejected<s%> His <S%G2992>people,<s%> has He? May it <S%G3361>never<s%> be! For I <S%G2532>too<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> an <S%G2475>Israelite,<s%> a <S%G4690>descendant<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G958>Benjamin.<s%>

<S%G2316>God<s%> has not <S%G683>rejected<s%> His <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G4267>foreknew.<s%> <S%G2228>Or<s%> do you not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> in [the passage about] <S%G2243>Elijah,<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> he <S%G1793>pleads<s%> with <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%>?

<S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> they have <S%G615>killed<s%> Thy <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> they have <S%G2679>torn<s%> <S%G2679>down<s%> <S%G4771>Thine<s%> <S%G2379>altars,<s%> and I <S%G3441>alone<s%> am <S%G5275>left,<s%> and they are <S%G2212>seeking<s%> my <S%G5590>life.<s%>"

But <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G5538>divine<s%> <S%G5538>response<s%> to him? "I have <S%G2641>kept<s%> for <S%G1683>Myself<s%> <S%G2035>seven<s%> <S%G2035>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> have not <S%G2578>bowed<s%> the <S%G1119>knee<s%> to <S%G896>Baal.<s%>"

In the <S%G3779>same<s%> <S%G3779>way<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> there has <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1096>come<s%> to be at the <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> a <S%G3005>remnant<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to [God's] <S%G5485>gracious<s%> <S%G1589>choice.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> it is by <S%G5485>grace,<s%> it is <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> on the <S%G1537>basis<s%> of <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G1893>otherwise<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> is <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G5485>grace.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? That <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> is <S%G1934>seeking<s%> for, it has not <S%G2013>obtained,<s%> but <S%G1589>those<s%> who were <S%G1589>chosen<s%> <S%G2013>obtained<s%> it, and the <S%G3062>rest<s%> were <S%G4456>hardened;<s%>

<S%G2509>just<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2316>"God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> them a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G2659>stupor,<s%> <S%G3788>Eyes<s%> to <S%G991>see<s%> not and <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> not, <S%G2193>Down<s%> to <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>very<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>"

And <S%G7035>David<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> "Let their <S%G5132>table<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G3803>snare<s%> and a <S%G2339>trap,<s%> And a <S%G4625>stumbling<s%> <S%G4625>block<s%> and a <S%G468>retribution<s%> to them.
"Let their <S%G3788>eyes<s%> be <S%G4654>darkened<s%> to <S%G991>see<s%> not, And <S%G4781>bend<s%> their <S%G3577>backs<s%> <S%G1223>forever.<s%> <S%G3956><s%>"

I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> they did not <S%G4417>stumble<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> as to <S%G4098>fall,<s%> did they? May it <S%G3361>never<s%> be! But by their <S%G3900>transgression<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> [has come] to the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> to <S%G3863>make<s%> them <S%G3863>jealous.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> their <S%G3900>transgression<s%> be <S%G4149>riches<s%> for the <S%G2889>world<s%> and their <S%G2275>failure<s%> be <S%G4149>riches<s%> for the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> will their <S%G4138>fulfillment<s%> be!

But I am <S%G3004>speaking<s%> to you who are <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%> <S%G1909>Inasmuch<s%> <S%G3745><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> as I <S%G1510>am<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> I <S%G1392>magnify<s%> my <S%G1248>ministry,<s%>
<S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G4458>somehow<s%> I might <S%G3863>move<s%> to <S%G3863>jealousy<s%> my <S%G4561>fellow<s%> <S%G4561>countrymen<s%> and <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of them.

For <S%G1487>if<s%> their <S%G580>rejection<s%> be the <S%G2643>reconciliation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> will [their] <S%G4356>acceptance<s%> be but <S%G2222>life<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%>?

And <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G536>first<s%> <S%G536>piece<s%> [of dough] be <S%G40>holy,<s%> the <S%G5445>lump<s%> is <S%G2532>also;<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G4491>root<s%> be <S%G40>holy,<s%> the <S%G2798>branches<s%> are <S%G2532>too.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G2798>branches<s%> were <S%G1575>broken<s%> <S%G1575>off,<s%> and you, <S%G1510>being<s%> a <S%G65>wild<s%> <S%G65>olive,<s%> were <S%G1461>grafted<s%> in <S%G1722>among<s%> them and <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G4791>partaker<s%> with them of the <S%G4096>rich<s%> <S%G4491>root<s%> of the <S%G1636>olive<s%> <S%G1636>tree,<s%>

do not be <S%G2620>arrogant<s%> <S%G2620>toward<s%> the <S%G2798>branches;<s%> but <S%G1487>if<s%> you are <S%G2620>arrogant,<s%> [remember that] it is not you who <S%G941>supports<s%> the <S%G4491>root,<s%> but the <S%G4491>root<s%> [supports] you.
You will <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> <S%G2798>"Branches<s%> were <S%G1575>broken<s%> <S%G1575>off<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that I might be <S%G1461>grafted<s%> in."

<S%G2573>Quite<s%> <S%G2573>right,<s%> they were <S%G1575>broken<s%> <S%G1575>off<s%> for their <S%G570>unbelief,<s%> but you <S%G2476>stand<s%> by your <S%G4102>faith.<s%> Do not be <S%G5426>conceited,<s%> <S%G5308><s%> but <S%G5399>fear;<s%>
for <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> did not <S%G5339>spare<s%> the <S%G5449>natural<s%> <S%G2798>branches,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> will He <S%G5339>spare<s%> you.

<S%G3708>Behold<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> the <S%G5544>kindness<s%> and <S%G663>severity<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4098>fell,<s%> <S%G663>severity,<s%> but to you, God's <S%G5544>kindness,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G1961>continue<s%> in His <S%G5544>kindness;<s%> <S%G1893>otherwise<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> will be <S%G1581>cut<s%> <S%G1581>off.<s%>

And they <S%G2548>also,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they do not <S%G1961>continue<s%> in their <S%G570>unbelief,<s%> will be <S%G1461>grafted<s%> in; for <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1415>able<s%> to <S%G1461>graft<s%> them in <S%G3825>again.<s%>

For <S%G1437>if<s%> you were <S%G1581>cut<s%> <S%G1581>off<s%> from <S%G65>what<s%> is by <S%G5449>nature<s%> a <S%G65>wild<s%> <S%G65>olive<s%> <S%G65>tree,<s%> and were <S%G1461>grafted<s%> <S%G3844>contrary<s%> to <S%G5449>nature<s%> into a <S%G2565>cultivated<s%> <S%G2565>olive<s%> <S%G2565>tree,<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> shall <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are the <S%G2596>natural<s%> <S%G5449><s%> [branches] be <S%G1461>grafted<s%> into their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1636>olive<s%> <S%G1636>tree<s%>?

For I do not <S%G2309>want<s%> you, <S%G80>brethren,<s%> to be <S%G50>uninformed<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3466>mystery,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> you be <S%G5429>wise<s%> in your <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1438>estimation,<s%> that a <S%G3313>partial<s%> <S%G4457>hardening<s%> has <S%G1096>happened<s%> to <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G4138>fulness<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> has <S%G1525>come<s%> in;

and <S%G3779>thus<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> will be <S%G4982>saved;<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "The <S%G4506>Deliverer<s%> will <S%G2240>come<s%> from <S%G4622>Zion,<s%> He will <S%G654>remove<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness<s%> from <S%G2384>Jacob.<s%>"
"And <S%G3778>this<s%> is My <S%G1242>covenant<s%> with them, <S%G3752>When<s%> I <S%G851>take<s%> <S%G851>away<s%> their <S%G266>sins.<s%>"

From the <S%G2596>standpoint<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> they are <S%G2190>enemies<s%> for your <S%G1223>sake,<s%> but from the <S%G2596>standpoint<s%> of [God's] <S%G1589>choice<s%> they are <S%G27>beloved<s%> for the <S%G1223>sake<s%> of the <S%G3962>fathers;<s%>
for the <S%G5486>gifts<s%> and the <S%G2821>calling<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> are <S%G278>irrevocable.<s%>

For <S%G5618>just<s%> as you <S%G4218>once<s%> were <S%G544>disobedient<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> have been <S%G1653>shown<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> because of their <S%G543>disobedience,<s%>

<S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> have been <S%G544>disobedient,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that because of the <S%G1656>mercy<s%> shown to you they <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G3568>now<s%> be <S%G1653>shown<s%> <S%G1653>mercy.<s%>
For <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G4788>shut<s%> up <S%G3956>all<s%> in <S%G543>disobedience<s%> that He might <S%G1653>show<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> to <S%G3956>all.<s%>

<S%G5599>Oh,<s%> the <S%G899>depth<s%> of the <S%G4149>riches<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> of the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> and <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%> <S%G5613>How<s%> <S%G419>unsearchable<s%> are His <S%G2917>judgments<s%> and <S%G421>unfathomable<s%> His <S%G3598>ways!<s%>
For <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G1097>known<s%> the <S%G3563>mind<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> His <S%G4825>counselor<s%>?
<S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G4272>first<s%> <S%G4272>given<s%> to Him that it might be <S%G467>paid<s%> <S%G467>back<s%> to him again?
For from Him and <S%G1223>through<s%> Him and to Him are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things.<s%> To Him [be] the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
